snippet: As opportunities expand in countries like China and India, a growing number of well-educated Americans are emigrating to their ancestral homelands.
abstract: Growing number of well-educated children of immigrants to the United States are emigrating to their ancestral homelands as opportunities expand in countries like China and India; trend underscores the evolving nature of global migration and the challenges to American economic supremacy and competitiveness.
lead_paragraph: As opportunities expand in countries like China and India, a growing number of well-educated Americans are emigrating to their ancestral homelands.

headline.seo: More U.S. Children of Immigrants Are Leaving U.S.
headline.main: Many U.S. Immigrants’ Children Seek American Dream Abroad
headline.print_headline: Many U.S. Immigrants’ Children Seek American Dream Abroad
